alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 24 at 3:03AM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches, with locally higher amounts, possible. * WHERE...The St Lawrence Valley, portions of the Adirondacks, and much of central and southeastern Vermont. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will occur late Wednesday and Wednesday night. Snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour are possible. The snow may mix with sleet or freezing rain at times, especially in central and southeastern Vermont.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
